node.excerpt: I've read a lot of science fiction and fantasy novels over the years, too many to go through in one post. So I'm going to start with the most recent one I really enjoyed, and go back from there. The Broken Earth trilogy starts with  The Fifth Season…

Hi! My name's Bryan, and this is my blog. I'll put a bit of an overview of what I'll be doing here in this first post. I'll be using this blog to post about some of the things I love - namely, board games, Magic: The Gathering, anime, and sci-fi…
